item.title: Japan
item.dc:creator: seantmahoney92@gmail.com
item.description: Dates: December 1, 2022 – December 23, 2022 Organizations: Book Drive こどものみらい古本募金 Items: Collect the secondhand books and the sold amountwill be donated to the NPO of our choice Instructions: […]
item.content:encoded:
Dates: December 1, 2022 – December 23, 2022

Organizations: Book Drive こどものみらい古本募金

Items:
Collect the secondhand books and the sold amount
will be donated to the NPO of our choice

Instructions:
The employees bring the books at home under certain conditions
– Newer than 2010
– In good condition
– Games & DVDs are also accepted
Pack in a box and send them to value books.
Donate the sold amount via value books to a specific NPO of our choice

item.title: Paris
item.dc:creator: seantmahoney92@gmail.com
item.description: Dates: November 21, 2022 – December 9, 2022 Organizations: ODP (Orphelins et Dons d’entraide des Sapeurs-Pompiers), Les restaurants du Coeur, Emmaus Items: Toy Drive Instructions: “Collection Box” : all employees […]
item.content:encoded:
Dates: November 21, 2022 – December 9, 2022

Organizations: ODP (Orphelins et Dons d’entraide des Sapeurs-Pompiers), Les restaurants du Coeur, Emmaus

Items:
Toy Drive

Instructions:
“Collection Box” : all employees can deposit toys that are still in good condition or new. A company will then take care of collecting the gifts that we will distribute to non profit organizations

item.content:encoded:
Dates: November 1, 2022 – December 9, 2022

Organization: The Salvation Army

Items:
New, unwrapped toys and gifts for children.

Instructions:
Elasticians to bring items from the list to the office; Tereza book a courier to collect items on 9th Dec an drop at SE5 8BQ
